extension.summary: Launches Steam in Big Picture mode from within XBMC.
extension.description: Launches Steam from within XBMC - It will close XBMC, launch Steam in Big Picture mode and when Steam is exited XBMC will restart. Steam also comes with a full featured web browser than can be controlled with a game pad or remote and plays back flash content. It works with Windows, Linux and quite possibly OSX, but this hasn't been tested. See http://forum.xbmc.org/showthread.php?tid=157499http://forum.xbmc.org/showthread.php?tid=157499 for more info
